key.name: register_app_desc
key.value: In order to enable Facebook Connect on your site, please create/edit* your Facebook Application, and then copy the information provided by Facebook to the form below.

key.name: settings_admin_email_desc
key.value: Index Email - this email is used as index for facebook profiles that do not have an email. If you set Index Email as admin@example.com those users will be automatically registered with admin+userID@example.com
